content:
Groundwater Estimation in Bangalore (Bengaluru Rural and Bengaluru Urban):

The provided data encompasses groundwater estimations for Bengaluru Rural and Bengaluru Urban districts in Karnataka, across the years 2021, 2022, 2023, and 2024.  Note that many data points are missing across all entries.

**Averages across all available years for Bengaluru Rural:**

| Metric                                                                          | Value             | Unit  | Description                                                                                                                                       | Significance                                                                                                                                                                |
|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------|-------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Annual Ground water Recharge (ham) - Total - Total                              | 19929.24          | ham   | Total annual groundwater recharge from all sources.                                                                                                 | Represents the total replenishment of groundwater resources annually. Higher values indicate better groundwater recharge.                                                                     |
| Annual Extractable Ground water Resource (ham) - Total - Total                    | 18061.74          | ham   | Total extractable groundwater resource.                                                                                                       | Indicates the amount of groundwater that can be safely extracted without depleting the aquifer.                                                                                    |
| Ground Water Extraction for all uses (ha.m) - Total - Total                       | 24638.77          | ha.m  | Total groundwater extraction for domestic, industrial, and irrigation purposes.                                                                    | Shows the total amount of groundwater withdrawn.  Comparison with extractable resources reveals over-extraction if extraction is higher.                                                     |
| Stage of Ground Water Extraction (%) - Total - Total                              | 142.23            | %     | Percentage of groundwater extraction relative to availability.                                                                                    |  Indicates the level of stress on the aquifer.  Values above 100% represent over-extraction.                                                                                 |
| Net Annual Ground Water Availability for Future Use (ham) - Total - Total           | 0.00              | ham   | Available groundwater for future use.                                                                                                          |  Indicates the net groundwater available after accounting for recharge and extraction; in this case, there is a significant deficit.                                                  |
| Environmental Flows (ham) - Total - Total                                        | 1867.86           | ham   | Water reserved for environmental needs.                                                                                                        |  Highlights the volume of water allocated to maintain the environmental health of the groundwater system.                                                                      |
| Allocation of Ground Water Resource for Domestic Utilisation for projected year 2025 (ham) - Total - Total | 2925.35           | ham   | Future domestic water allocation.                                                                                                          | Represents the projected domestic water demand in 2025.                                                                                                                          |
| Rainfall (mm) - Total                                                            | 857.46            | mm    | Total rainfall.                                                                                                                                   |  A key factor driving groundwater recharge.                                                                                                                                    |
| Total Geographical Area (ha) - Recharge Worthy Area (ha) - Total                | 223651.0          | ha    | Total area suitable for groundwater recharge.                                                                                                   |  Provides context for groundwater recharge rates.                                                                                                                            |
| Total Geographical Area (ha) - Hilly Area - Total                               | 6386.0            | ha    | Total hilly area.                                                                                                                                | Hilly areas often have different recharge characteristics than flat areas.                                                                                                      |
| Total Geographical Area (ha) - Total - Total                                   | 230037.0          | ha    | Total geographical area.                                                                                                                        | Provides the overall context for the entire area.                                                                                                                                |
| Total Ground Water Availability in Unconfined Aquifer (ham) - Other Parameters Present - Fresh | 17666.76          | ham   | Total available groundwater in the unconfined aquifer.                                                                                             | Represents the total groundwater resource readily available in the unconfined aquifer.                                                                                         |


**Averages across all available years for Bengaluru Urban:**

Only one year's data (2023) is available for Bengaluru Urban. Therefore, no averages are calculated. The values for 2023 are presented below:


| Metric                                                                          | Value             | Unit  | Description                                                                                                                                       | Significance                                                                                                                                                                |
|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------|-------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Annual Ground water Recharge (ham) - Total - Total                              | 31739.53          | ham   | Total annual groundwater recharge from all sources.                                                                                                 | Represents the total replenishment of groundwater resources annually. Higher values indicate better groundwater recharge.                                                                     |
| Annual Extractable Ground water Resource (ham) - Total - Total                    | 28565.58          | ham   | Total extractable groundwater resource.                                                                                                       | Indicates the amount of groundwater that can be safely extracted without depleting the aquifer.                                                                                    |
| Ground Water Extraction for all uses (ha.m) - Total - Total                       | 53332.51          | ha.m  | Total groundwater extraction for domestic, industrial, and irrigation purposes.                                                                    | Shows the total amount of groundwater withdrawn.  Comparison with extractable resources reveals over-extraction if extraction is higher.                                                     |
| Stage of Ground Water Extraction (%) - Total - Total                              | 186.70            | %     | Percentage of groundwater extraction relative to availability.                                                                                    |  Indicates the level of stress on the aquifer.  Values above 100% represent over-extraction.                                                                                 |
| Net Annual Ground Water Availability for Future Use (ham) - Total - Total           | 0.00              | ham   | Available groundwater for future use.                                                                                                          |  Indicates the net groundwater available after accounting for recharge and extraction; in this case, there is a significant deficit.                                                  |
| Environmental Flows (ham) - Total - Total                                        | 3173.95           | ham   | Water reserved for environmental needs.                                                                                                        |  Highlights the volume of water allocated to maintain the environmental health of the groundwater system.                                                                      |
| Allocation of Ground Water Resource for Domestic Utilisation for projected year 2025 (ham) - Total - Total | 16447.68          | ham   | Future domestic water allocation.                                                                                                          | Represents the projected domestic water demand in 2025.                                                                                                                          |
| Rainfall (mm) - Total                                                            | 784.70            | mm    | Total rainfall.                                                                                                                                   |  A key factor driving groundwater recharge.                                                                                                                                    |
| Total Geographical Area (ha) - Recharge Worthy Area (ha) - Total                | 213026.0          | ha    | Total area suitable for groundwater recharge.                                                                                                   |  Provides context for groundwater recharge rates.                                                                                                                            |
| Total Geographical Area (ha) - Hilly Area - Total                               | 6533.0            | ha    | Total hilly area.                                                                                                                                | Hilly areas often have different recharge characteristics than flat areas.                                                                                                      |
| Total Geographical Area (ha) - Total - Total                                   | 219559.0          | ha    | Total geographical area.                                                                                                                        | Provides the overall context for the entire area.                                                                                                                                |
| Total Ground Water Availability in Unconfined Aquifer (ham) - Other Parameters Present - Fresh | 28565.58          | ham   | Total available groundwater in the unconfined aquifer.                                                                                             | Represents the total groundwater resource readily available in the unconfined aquifer.                                                                                         |


**Missing Data:**  Significant data is missing, particularly regarding inflows and outflows,  various components of groundwater recharge (Canals and Pipelines), and water quality parameters. This limits the scope of a complete analysis.  The "Net Annual Ground Water Availability for Future Use" is consistently 0, suggesting a significant groundwater deficit across all years.  The high percentage of groundwater extraction relative to availability also indicates substantial stress on the aquifer.

Groundwater Estimation in Chhattisgarh:

The provided data includes groundwater estimations for several districts in Chhattisgarh across multiple years (2016, 2021, 2022, 2024).  Averages are calculated across available years for each metric, however, significant data gaps exist.  The following summary presents averages where possible, explicitly noting missing values.

**Averaged Groundwater Metrics Across Available Chhattisgarh Districts and Years:**

| Metric                                                                          | Value             | Unit  | Description                                                                                                                                       | Significance                                                                                                                                                                |
|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------|-------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Annual Ground water Recharge (ham) - Total - Total                              | 44084.07          | ham   | Total annual groundwater recharge from all sources.                                                                                                 | Represents the total replenishment of groundwater resources annually.  Higher values indicate better groundwater recharge.                                                                     |
| Annual Extractable Ground water Resource (ham) - Total - Total                    | 40359.87          | ham   | Total extractable groundwater resource.                                                                                                       | Indicates the amount of groundwater that can be safely extracted without depleting the aquifer.                                                                                    |
| Ground Water Extraction for all uses (ha.m) - Total - Total                       | 17203.08          | ha.m  | Total groundwater extraction for domestic, industrial, and irrigation purposes.                                                                    | Shows the total amount of groundwater withdrawn. Comparison with extractable resources reveals over-extraction if extraction is higher.                                                     |
| Stage of Ground Water Extraction (%) - Total - Total                              | 44.34             | %     | Percentage of groundwater extraction relative to availability.                                                                                    | Indicates the level of stress on the aquifer. Values above 100% represent over-extraction.                                                                                 |
| Net Annual Ground Water Availability for Future Use (ham) - Total - Total           | 18890.75          | ham   | Available groundwater for future use.                                                                                                          | Indicates the net groundwater available after accounting for recharge and extraction.  Positive values indicate a surplus; negative values indicate a deficit.                                                  |
| Environmental Flows (ham) - Total - Total                                        | 3724.20           | ham   | Water reserved for environmental needs.                                                                                                        | Highlights the volume of water allocated to maintain the environmental health of the groundwater system.                                                                      |
| Allocation of Ground Water Resource for Domestic Utilisation for projected year 2025 (ham) - Total - Total | 2524.24           | ham   | Future domestic water allocation.                                                                                                          | Represents the projected domestic water demand in 2025.                                                                                                                          |
| Rainfall (mm) - Total                                                            | 1074.38           | mm    | Total rainfall.                                                                                                                                   | A key factor driving groundwater recharge.                                                                                                                                    |
| Total Geographical Area (ha) - Recharge Worthy Area (ha) - C                     | 29794.20          | ha    | Total area suitable for groundwater recharge in consolidated areas.                                                                              | Provides context for groundwater recharge rates in consolidated areas.                                                                                                                 |
| Total Geographical Area (ha) - Recharge Worthy Area (ha) - NC                    | 242835.40         | ha    | Total area suitable for groundwater recharge in non-consolidated areas.                                                                             | Provides context for groundwater recharge rates in non-consolidated areas.                                                                                                                 |
| Total Geographical Area (ha) - Recharge Worthy Area (ha) - PQ                    | 0.00              | ha    | Total area suitable for groundwater recharge in partially consolidated areas.                                                                     | Provides context for groundwater recharge rates in partially consolidated areas (none in this data).                                                                               |
| Total Geographical Area (ha) - Recharge Worthy Area (ha) - Total                | 272629.60         | ha    | Total area suitable for groundwater recharge.                                                                                                   | Provides overall context for groundwater recharge rates.                                                                                                                            |
| Total Geographical Area (ha) - Hilly Area - Total                               | 92916.40          | ha    | Total hilly area.                                                                                                                                | Hilly areas often have different recharge characteristics than flat areas.                                                                                                      |
| Total Geographical Area (ha) - Total - Total                                   | 365546.00         | ha    | Total geographical area.                                                                                                                        | Provides the overall context for the entire area.                                                                                                                                |
| Total Ground Water Availability in Unconfined Aquifer (ham) - Other Parameters Present - Fresh | No data available | ham   | Total available groundwater in the unconfined aquifer.                                                                                       | Represents the total groundwater resource readily available in the unconfined aquifer.                                                                                         |


**Missing Data:**  Extensive data is missing across numerous columns including  Inflows and Outflows,  detailed breakdowns of groundwater recharge from various sources (Canals and Pipelines, Sewages and Flash Flood Channels), and water quality parameters (Quality Tagging).  The lack of data on confined and semi-confined aquifers also limits the comprehensive analysis.

**District-Specific Data:**  While averages are provided above, detailed yearly data for each district is available in the original data entry.  Please refer to the original data for this district-level information.
